messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-Image-Matting node?
ComfyUI-Image-Matting is an extension that allows users to perform image matting, separating the foreground from the background in an image.
Where can I find a sample workflow for ComfyUI-Image-Matting?
A sample workflow for ComfyUI-Image-Matting can be downloaded from the GitHub repository.
Does the ComfyUI-Image-Matting node provide an example workflow?
Yes, the ComfyUI-Image-Matting documentation provides a link to download a sample workflow example.
How can I visualize the workflow of ComfyUI-Image-Matting?
The documentation includes an image demonstrating the workflow of ComfyUI-Image-Matting.
